fullText: Wilson has written a play that's as nourishing as the sandwiches her characters make, finding in their small acts of creation a metaphor for the larger work of rebuilding lives.

bwwExcerpt: Nottage's delightful new play, "Clyde's," which opened at the Helen Hayes Theater on Tuesday, dares to flip the paradigm.
